global.name: Ism
global.subject: Mavzu
global.biometricChangeError: Biometric authentication is disabled due a change in biometric data or system settings on your device. Please re-enable biometric authentication by manually going to Settings -> Security -> Biometric Authentication
global.thisMayTakeFewSeconds: Bunga bir necha soniya ketishi mumkin ...
global.atLeastOneSymbol: Kamida bitta maxsus belgi (! @,? Va boshqalar)
global.tooManyAttempts: Juda ko'p muvaffaqiyatsiz urinishlar. %{after} daqiqadan so'ng qayta urinib ko'ring.
global.passcodeAttemptExceed: Parolni kiritish chegarasi oshib ketdi, keyinroq qayta urinib ko'ring.
global.autoWipeAlert: Siz dasturni qulfdan chiqarishga %{times} marta noto'g'ri urinib ko'rdingiz, yana bir marta muvaffaqiyatsiz urinishdan so'ng, dastur qayta tiklanadi va hisobingizdagi barcha ma'lumotlar yo'qoladi.
global.cannotValidateCurrentTimeWithServer: Ilova vaqtini server vaqti bilan sinxronlashtirish mumkin emas. Internetga ulanganingizga ishonch hosil qiling!
global.pleaseAddAccountToSignTheTransaction: Iltimos, bitimni tasdiqlash uchun hisob qaydnomasini qo'shing
global.pleaseAddAccountToAccessXApp: Please add an account to access xApp
global.noSpendableAccountIsAvailableForSendingP: Hozirda to'lovlarni jo'natish uchun etarlik mablag 'mavjud emas.
global.pleaseCheckSessionLogForMoreInfo: Пожалуйста, проверьте журналы сеанса для получения дополнительной информации!
global.signedTransactionDetectedSubmit: Imzolangan bitim aniqlandi. XRP Ledger yuborilsinmi?
global.weNeedYourPermissionToUseYourCamera: Sizning kamerangizdan foydalanish uchun sizning ruxsatingiz kerak
global.unableToConnectToXRPLNodePleaseCheckYour: XRPL tizimiga ulanib bo'lmadi. Iltimos, Internetga ulanishni tekshiring va qaytadan urining
global.pressBackAgainToExit: Chiqish uchun yana bir marta bosing
global.thisAccountIsReportedAsScamOrFraudulentA: Ushbu hisob firibgar yoki firibgar manzil sifatida xabar qilingan. Iltimos, ehtiyotkorlik bilan davom eting
global.biometricIsNotAvailable: Biometriya (Barmoq izi yoki Face ID) mavjud emas. Agar sizning qurilmangiz biometrik autentifikatsiyani qo'llab-quvvatlasa, iltimos, avval uni sozlang (OS sozlamalari)
global.pushErrorPermissionMessage: Push xabarnomalarini ro'yxatdan o'tkazib bo'lmadi. Kerakli bildirishnomalarga ruxsat berish uchun iltimos, tizim sozlamalariga o'ting va XUMM> Bildirishnomalar yoqilganligiga ishonch hosil qiling.
global.thePasswordYouEnteredIsIncorrectExplain: Siz kiritgan parol noto'g'ri. Bitimni imzolash uchun to'g'ri parolni kiritishingiz kerak. Siz ushbu parolni XUMM-ga kirishni xohlagan hisob qaydnomangizga qo'shganingizda kiritdingiz.
global.thePasscodeYouEnteredIsIncorrectExplain: Siz kiritgan parol noto'g'ri. Bitimni imzolash uchun to'g'ri parolni kiritishingiz kerak. Siz XUMM-ni birinchi marta o'rnatganingizda ushbu parolni kiritgansiz.
global.unableToFetchCurrencyRate: Afsuski, biz valyuta kurslarini ololmadik. Iltimos, Internetga ulanganingizga ishonch hosil qiling
global.transactionFeeIsNotSet: Transaction fee is not set, please wait until transaction fee is set and try again!
global.unableToSetAccountSequence: Unable to set account Sequence, please check that you are connected to the internet.
global.unableToGetLastClosedLedger: Unable to get last closed ledger, please check you are connected to the internet.
global.hookFeeNotice: Note: The total transaction fee includes a %{hookFee} %{nativeAsset} hooks fee.
global.unableToLoadNetworkFee: Unable to load the network fee!
global.doNotCloseTheApp:
Do NOT close Xaman
Do NOT lock your device

onboarding.slideOne_title:
To'lovlar va
to'lov talablari
XRP Ledger da
onboarding.slideTwo_desc: To'liq kirish rejimida bir nechta hisob qaydnomalarini qo'shing yoki faqat o'qing. To'liq kirish hisob qaydnomangiz bilan operatsiyalarni yuboring va so'rovlarni imzolang.
onboarding.slideThree_desc: Xumm dasturi va platformasi ustuvor vazifa sifatida xavfsizlik bilan qurilgan. Hech qachon sirlaringizni boshqa kiritmang, o'zingizning ishonchli qurilmangizdan operatsiyalarni imzolang.
onboarding.slideFour_desc: Siz XRP va boshqa ishonchli aktivlarni (IOU) yuborishingiz va olishingiz mumkin.

setupPasscode.passCodeDescription: Biz parolni dasturni bloklash, sozlamalarni tasdiqlash va hisobingizni xavfsiz saqlash uchun ishlatamiz.
setupPasscode.warnNeedPasscode: Ilovani qulfdan chiqarish uchun sizga parol kerak bo'ladi
setupPasscode.UnableToStoreThePasscode: Parol saqlanmadi. Bunday bo'lmasligi kerak. Xato hisoboti Xaman-ni qo'llab-quvvatlash guruhiga yuborildi. Qo'shimcha ma'lumot uchun biz bilan support@xumm.app elektron manzili orqali bog'laning.
setupPasscode.weakPasscodeDescription: Tanlangan parolni taxmin qilish oson. Biz sizga kuchliroq tanlash tavsiya.

setupBiometry.biometryDescription: Hisobingiz xavfsizligini ta'minlash uchun siz biometrik autentifikatsiyani (FaceID / TouchID) faollashtirishingiz mumkin.

setupPermissions.permissionDescription: Imzo so'rovlari to'g'risida ogohlantirish uchun biz push xabarnomalaridan foydalanamiz

setupTermOfService.XamanNotCustodialExplain:
Xaman - bu saqlashga tegishli bo'lmagan hamyon, ya'ni sizning mablag'laringiz Xaman ning uzida emas, balki XRP Ledgerrida "saqlanadi".

Xaman tomonidan ishlab chiqarilgan yoki Xaman-ga import qilingan o'zingizning hisobingiz sirlari bilan o'zingizning mablag'laringizga kirishingiz mumkin.


Bu shuni anglatadiki, Xaman va Xaman jamoasi xatoga yo'l qo'yganingizda yoki maxfiy kalitlarni yo'qotib qo'ysangiz, sizning mablag'laringizga kira olmaydi va ularni qayta tiklay olmaydi.
setupTermOfService.keepYourSecretsSafe: Xavfsizlik sababli, iltimos, maxfiy kalitlarni oflayn rejimda saqlashni o'ylab ko'ring.
setupTermOfService.KeepYourSecretsSafeExplain:
Sizning hisobingiz siri(laridan) foydalangan holda faqat siz o'zingizning mablag'ingizga kira olasiz.

Ularni xavfsiz va oflayn rejimda saqlash uchun faqat siz va o'zingiz javobgarsiz.

O'zingizning zaxira nusxangizni bir nechta oflayn rejimda yozing.
setupTermOfService.IWillKeepMySecretsSafeAndOffline: Men sirlarimni xavfsiz va oflaynda saqlayman
setupTermOfService.transactionsArePermanentExplain:
Xaman tranzaktsiyalarni qaytarib berolmaydi yoki agar siz xato qilsangiz mablag'larni tiklay olmaysiz.

Tranzaksiyalar tezda va qaytarib bo'lmaydigan bo'ladi
setupTermOfService.iAmResponsibleForKeepingMyKeysAndFundsSa: Kalitlarim va mablag'larim xavfsizligini saqlash uchun men javobgarman
setupTermOfService.yourFundsLiveOnTheXRPLedgerExplain:
Xaman - bu XRP  ledgerining mijoz dasturi.

Bu sizning XRP Xaman-da emas, balki XRP Ledger-da joylashganligini anglatadi.

Yuborilgan va qabul qilingan operatsiyalar to'g'ridan-to'g'ri XRP Ledgerida yuboriladi va qabul qilinadi.
setupTermOfService.myFundsAreRegisteredOnTheXRPLedger: Mening mablag'larim Xaman ichida emas, XRP  ledgerida ro'yxatdan o'tgan
setupTermOfService.neverShareYourSecret: Hech qachon sirli kalitni baham ko'rmang
setupTermOfService.neverShareYourSecretExplain:
Xaman va XUmm-ni qo"llab-quvvatlash bo"limi hech qachon sizning siringizni so"ramaydi 

Agar kimdur siringinizni suragan bo"lsa yoki biron joyga kiritishingizni so"rasa, sizni  aldashmoqchi.

Hodisa haqida sizda qancha ma"lumot bo"lsa,iltimos biz bilan boglaning.
setupTermOfService.IWillNeverGiveMySecretsToAnyone: Men hech qachon sirlarimni birovga bermayman va hech qachon boshqa joyga kiritmayman
setupTermOfService.whenYouChangeYourPhoneExplain: Xavfsizligi sababli boshqa telefonni (yangi / almashtirish) olganingizda, Xaman yana barcha hisoblaringizni hisob sirlaridan foydalangan holda import qilishni so'raydi.
setupTermOfService.IWillKeepMySecretsSafeSoICanReEnterThemI: Men sirlarimni xavfsiz, oflaynda saqlayman, shuning uchun yangi telefon olsam, ularni qayta kiritishim mumkin
setupTermOfService.questionsAndSupportExplain:
Agar sizda savollar bo'lsa, siz tez-tez so'raladigan savollarni o'qishingiz va https://support.xumm.app sahifasida savollar berishingiz mumkin.

Bu XUMM-ni qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun faqatgina ishonchli kanal.
setupTermOfService.IOnlyTrustAnswersFromXamanSupportTeam: Men faqat https://support.xumm.app saytidagi Xaman qo'llab-quvvatlash guruhining javoblariga ishonaman
setupTermOfService.pleaseReadTheTextAboveCarefully: Iltimos, yuqoridagi matnni diqqat bilan o'qing

home.otherAssetsDesc: XRP ledger, shuningdek, XRP-dan tashqari aktivlarning qoldiqlarini saqlash va yuborish va qabul qilish imkonini beradi. Ushbu aktivlarni XRP ledger boshqa hisobvaraqlar orqali berish mumkin. Agar siz XRP bo'lmagan aktivni yuborish yoki qabul qilishni xohlasangiz, XRP bo'lmagan aktivni beruvchiga ishonishingiz kerak bo'ladi.
home.nativeAssetYouOwnVsYourSpendableBalance: Sizga tegishli bo'lgan %{nativeAsset} sizning sarflanadigan balansingizga nisbatan.
home.emptyAccountAddFirstAccount: Bu erda biroz bo'sh,birinchi hisobingizni qo'shing.
home.shareReadonlyAccountWarning: Sizda ushbu o'qish uchun hisob qaydnomasi kalitlari bormi yoki bu sizning almashinuv hisobingizmi?
home.exchangeAccountReadonlyExplain: Siz to'g'ridan-to'g'ri almashinuv hisob raqamingizga pul ololmaysiz: buning uchun sizga manzil yorlig'i kerak. Iltimos, birja manzilingiz yorlig'ini oling va qo'lda pul qo'ying.

events.transactionFailedWithCode: Ushbu tranzaksiya holat kodi bilan bajarilmadi %{txCode}
events.unableToLoadTheTransaction: Tranzaksiya yuklanmadi! Iltimos, Internetga ulanganingizga ishonch hosil qiling.

events.theOfferExpiresAtUnlessCanceledOrConsume: Taklif muddati tugaydi %{expiration} agar bekor qilinmasa yoki undan oldin iste'mol qilinmasa.

Completion was triggered by %{address}
The escrowed amount of %{amount} %{currency} was delivered to %{destination}

events.theTransactionWillCancelCheckWithId: Tranzaksiya ID bilan tekshirishni bekor qiladi %{checkId}
events.itAuthorizesSendingPaymentsToThisAccount: Bu %{address} ga ushbu hisob raqamiga to'lovlarni yuborish huquqini beradi
events.itRemovesAuthorizesSendingPaymentsToThis: Bu %{address} uchun ushbu hisob raqamiga to'lovlarni yuborish huquqini olib tashlaydi
events.itRemovedTrustLineCurrencyTo: Ishoch yuli %{currency} valyutasini %{issuer} ga olib tashladi
events.itEstablishesTrustLineTo: Bu %{address} dan %{issuer} dan olinadigan %{currency} maksimal miqdori sifatida %{limit} ni belgilaydi va saqlashga tayyor.
events.itRemovesTheAccountEmailHash: Bu hisobning elektron xashini olib tashlaydi
events.itSetsAccountEmailHashTo: Bu hisobning elektron xashini %{emailHash} ga o'rnatadi
events.itRemovesTheAccountMessageKey: Bu hisob qaydnomasi kalitini olib tashlaydi
events.itRemovesTheAccountTransferRate: Bu hisobning o"tkazish tarifini olib tashlaydi

events.itSetsAccountMinterTo: It sets the account minter to %{minter}

events.itRemovesTheAccountWalletLocator: It removes the account's wallet locator

events.itRemovesTheAccountWalletSize: It removes the account's wallet size
events.pleaseReleaseThisEscrowUsingTheToolUsedT: Iltimos, ushbu garovni yaratish uchun ishlatiladigan asbob / platformadan foydalanib garov yarating. Xaman garovni qo'yib yuborishi mumkin emas, chunki garovda Escrow sharti mavjud.

settings.newOldPasscodeNotMatch: Yangi parol va sizning tasdiqlashingiz mos kelmadi!
settings.canNotSendLogsByEmail: Kutilmagan xatolik yuz berdi, jurnallarni elektron pochta orqali yuborib bo'lmaydi!

settings.biometricUnavailableDescription: Biometric security is unavailable on your device because your device does not offer our requested biometric security level
settings.successfullyReRegisteredForPushNotificat: Qushimca xabarlar muvaffaqiyatli qayta ro'yxatdan o'tkazildi.
settings.unableToReRegisteredForPushNotifications: Kutilmagan xatolik yuz berdi!Qushimcha xabarlarni qayta ro"yxatlab bo"lmadi.

settings.unableToRevokeAppAccess: An unexpected error occurred! Unable to revoke app access.
settings.onceYouAuthorizedAppYouWillSeeItHere: Once you authorize access to a third party app you'll see them here.
settings.unableToDeleteNodeWhenConnectedToNetwork: Unable to remove the node while connected to this network, please switch network and try again!
settings.developerModeEnabledWarning: Enabling Developer Mode may reduce certain security functions. Proceed with utmost caution, and only enable it if you comprehend the potential consequences.

settings.networkRailsAreAlreadyUpdateToDate: Network rails are already up to date
settings.networkRailsSuccessfullyUpdated: Network rails have been successfully updated

settings.networkHaveOnlyOneNodeAsDefault: This network has only one node, which is already set as the default.
settings.networkAreUpdateToDate: There are no added or changes for network settings at the moment.

account.addAccountDescription: Mavjud hisobingizni import qiling yoki yangi hisob yarating.
account.confirmPrivateDescription: Iltimos, raqamlarni keltiring, bu sizning xavfsizligingiz uchun: biz uni yozib qo'yganingizni tasdiqlashingizni so'raymiz.
account.PleaseEnterYourPasswordForAccount: Iltimos, ushbu hisob uchun parolingizni kiriting
account.pleaseEnterSafePassword: Yodda saqlash oson, lekin boshqalar taxmin qila olmaydigan,kengaytirilgan uzunlikdagi parolni yarating.
account.passwordShouldContain: Parolingiz kuchi hech bo'lmaganda ortacha bo'lishi kerak, iltimos, uzunroq yoki qiyinroq paroldan foydalaning (uzunroq bo'lsa yaxshiroq).
account.chooseWisely: Iltimos, ushbu hisobga mos keladigan xavfsizlik darajasini tanlang
account.passcodeOptionDesc: Bu kunlik sarf-xarajatlar uchun ideal. Siz shunchaki yuzingizni ko'rsatish, barmog'ingizni skanerlash yoki parolingizni kiritish orqali tranzaktsiyalarni imzolashingiz mumkin.
account.passwordOptionDesc: Ushbu parametr XRP-ni uzoq muddatli saqlash uchun yaxshiroqdir va tranzaktsiyalarni imzolash uchun parolni talab qiladi
account.hereIsYourPublicKey: Mana sizning yangi hisob qaydnomangiz. Endi siz mablag'larni yaratilgan umumiy hisob manziliga olishingiz mumkin.
account.writeDownPrivateKey: Barcha satrlarni qog'ozga yozing va uni xavfsiz joyda saqlang! Agar qurilmangiz ishdan chiqsa va sizda boshqa maxfiy raqamlar bo'lmasa, mablag'ingiz YO'Q.
account.privateKeyRowsDesc: O'zingizning mablag'ingizga faqat siz tegishingiz mumkin, ammo siz maxfiy raqamlaringizni xavfsiz saqlashingiz kerak bo'ladi. Sizning siringiz har bir satrda 6 ta raqamdan iborat 8 ta satrdan iborat (A-H belgisi bilan).
account.neverSharePrivateKey: Hech qachon sir raqamlaringizni (shaxsiy kalit) boshqalarga aytmang. Agar shunday qilsangiz, mablag'ingizga kirish huquqini yo'qotishingiz mumkin.
account.goBackClearTheInput:
Orqaga qaytishni xohlaysizmi?
(xavfsizlik sababli kirish o'chiriladi)
account.goBackRefillTheInput:
Orqaga qaytishni xohlaysizmi?
(xavfsizlik uchun barcha yozuvlarni qayta to'ldirishingiz kerak)
account.tangemCardEmptyGenerateWalletAlert: Tangem kartangizda hali XRP Ledger hisob qaydnomasi mavjud emas. Ushbu kartadan foydalanish uchun karta orqali hisob yaratilishi kerak.
account.tangemLongTapExplain: Ushbu mexanizm kartani yaqinlikdagi hujumlardan himoya qiladi: buyruqlarni qabul qilish va bajarish o'rtasida kechikishni ta'minlaydi.
account.tangemPasscodeExplain: Kartaning holatini o'zgartirishga olib keladigan har qanday buyruq bajarilishidan oldin siz parolni kiritishingiz kerak bo'ladi.
account.tangemAccessCodeExplain: Before the execution of any command, you will have to enter the access code.
account.tangemNFCNotSupportedDeviceAlert: Tangem kartalarini ishlatish NFC imkoniyatlarini talab qiladi. Sizning telefoningiz NFC-ni qo'llab-quvvatlamaydi.
account.fullAccessDesc: Tranzaktsiyalarni yuboring, imzolang va qabul qiling
account.readOnlyDesc: Balansni ko'ring va operatsiyalarni qabul qiling
account.youCanAlwaysGetFullAccess: Keyinchalik faqat o'qish mumkin bo'lgan hisobni to'liq kirish hisobiga yangilashingiz mumkin
account.secretNumbersDesc: Hisob turi afzal. 6 ta raqamdan iborat 8 ta qator
account.pleaseProvideAccountAddress:
Iltimos, hisob manzilingizni ko'rsating
("R ..." bilan boshlanadi)
account.pleaseProvideMnemonic: Iltimos, hisobingiz uchun Mnemonic (24 so'z) ni taqdim eting.
account.invalidHexPrivateKey: Noto'g'ri HEX shaxsiy kaliti! HEX shaxsiy kalitlari 66 HEX belgidan iborat bo'lishi kerak (A-F, 0-9).
account.pleaseProvideFamilySeed: Iltimos, o'zingizning hisobingiz sirini / oilaviy uyushma'ni bering.
account.pleaseChooseAccountLabel: Iltimos, ushbu hisob nomini kiriting (masalan, "sarflash" yoki "tejash").
account.accessLevelChangeAlert: Faqat o'qish rejimidan to'liq kirish rejimiga o'tish sizning hisob qaydnomangiz uchun maxfiy kalitni kiritishingizni talab qiladi
account.accountSettingsDescription: Hisobingiz sozlamalarini yoki hisob yorlig'ini bu erda tahrirlashingiz mumkin.
account.upgradingAccessLevelWarning: Siz kirish darajasini oshirmoqdasiz. Ushbu hisob uchun shaxsiy kalitni import qilishingiz kerak.
account.downgradingAccessLevelWarning: Siz kirish darajasini pasaytirmoqdasiz. Bu sizga ushbu hisob uchun shaxsiy kalitni yo'qotishga olib keladi. Ishonchingiz komilmi?
account.downgradingAccessLevelWarningPhysical: Siz foidalanish huquqi darajasini pasaytirmoqdasiz. Ishonchingiz komilmi?
account.removeTrustLineWarning: Siz ushbu aktivni hisobingizdan olib tashlamoqdasiz. Ushbu harakatni qaytarib bo'lmaydi. Ishonchingiz komilmi?
account.unavailableChangeSecurityLevel: Xavfsizlik darajasini o'zgartirish hozirda mumkin emas
account.accountRemoveWarning: Sizning hisob qaydnomangiz Xaman-dan butunlay o'chiriladi. Ishonchingiz komilmi?

account.accountLabelCannotBeMoreThan: Account label cannot be more than 64 characters!
account.activateRegularKeyAccountWarning:
If you want to use this account as Regular key only, you DO NOT have to activate the account.

However, if you want to use this account also to transact, you can activate this account.
account.selectedAccountIsNotActivatedPleaseChoos: Tanlangan hisob faollashtirilmagan. Ushbu operatsiyani imzolash uchun siz faol hisobni tanlashingiz kerak!
account.importingSecretAccountExist:
The account secret that you have entered belongs to this r-address and has already been imported into Xaman as a full access account.

%{address}
account.upgradeAccountSecretIsNotMatch: Kiritilgan sirli kalit boshqa r-manzilga tegishli. Agar oddiy kalitni import qilmoqchi bo'lsangiz, iltimos [Yangi hisobni import qilish]. Agar yo'q bo'lsa, iltimos, [bekor qiling] va yozuvingizni tekshiring.
account.masterKeyForThisAccountDisableRegularKey: Ushbu hisob uchun asosiy kalit o'chirilgan va oddiy kalit hisob qaydnomalari ro'yxatida topilmagan!
account.regularKeyAccountForThisAccountDoesNotIm: Ushbu hisob uchun odatiy kalit belgiga kirish imkoniyati bilan import qilinmadi!
account.allDoneYouCanGoToNextStepNow: Hammasi tayyor! Endi keyingi bosqichga o'tishingiz mumkin.
account.disableMasterKeyWarning: Tranzaksiya hisob uchun yopiq kalitni O'chiradi. Bu sizni bloklashi mumkin. Faqat bu sizning xohlagan narsangiz ekanligiga amin bo'lsangiz va nima qilayotganingizni bilsangiz davom eting.
account.mnemonicLargeAmountAlert: Agar sizning hisob qaydnomangiz muhim ahamiyatga ega bo'lgan holda mnemonic hisobingizni import qilishni o'ylab ko'rsangiz (masalan, sizning tejashingiz, katta miqdordagi XRP yoki boshqa belgilar)
account.importExchangeAddressReadonlyWarning: Sizning Exchange (depozit) hisobingizni import qilishning iloji yo'q. Bunday qilish birjadagi o'z balansingizni kuzatishga imkon bermaydi.
account.readOnlyAccountSpendableBalanceWarning: Please note: The access level for this account is Read-Only. There is currently no way to sign transactions that can affect the account state in any form.
account.deleteAccountWarning: Bu hisobni o'chirish operatsiyasi. Imzolanishda sizning hisob qaydnomangiz o'chiriladi va qolgan barcha mablag'lar (oxirgi %{ownerReserve}  ta saqlangan  XRPdan tashqari, chunki hisobni o'chirish uchun XRP daftaridagi to'lov %{ownerReserve} XRP), tuzilgan manzilga yuboriladi. Iltimos, manzilni ikki marta tekshiring va agar siz XRP daftaridagi hisobingizni o'chirishni xohlasangiz, FAQAT davom eting.
account.deleteAccountObjectsExistError: Siz ushbu hisobni o'chira olmaysiz, chunki sizning hisobingizda boshqa XRP daftar ob'ektlari mavjud, masalan, boshqa aktivlar, Markazlashtirilmagan Exchange takliflari, Escrows (yaratuvchi yoki benefitsiar sifatida)
account.deleteAccountSequenceIsNotEnoughError: Ushbu hisobni o'chirib bo'lmaydi (hali). Ushbu hisobni o'chirishdan oldin uni yopish uchun %{remainingSequence} ko'proq daftar kerak.
account.unableToCheckAccountObjects: Hisob ob'ektlarini tekshirib bo'lmadi, iltimos, XRP daftar tuguniga ulanganingizga ishonch hosil qiling
account.unableToCheckAccountNFTs: Unable to check for account NFTs, please make sure you are connected to the XRP ledger node
account.unableToFetchLedgerSequence: Joriy daftar ketma-ketligini olib bo'lmadi. Iltimos, XRPL tuguniga ulanganingizga ishonch hosil qiling.
account.unableGetDestinationAccountInfo: Belgilangan hisob qaydnomasi ma'lumotlarini olishning iloji yo'q, iltimos, XRP daftar tuguniga ulanganingizga ishonch hosil qiling
account.unableGetAccountInfo: Unable to fetch account info, please make sure you are connected to the XRP ledger node
account.destinationAccountIsNotActivated: Ushbu manzil hisobi faollashtirilmagan. Belgilangan hisob XRP daftarida mablag 'bilan ta'minlangan hisob bo'lishi kerak.
account.destinationAddressRequiredDestinationTag: Belgilangan manzil manzil yorlig'i(Tag)ni talab qiladi
account.destinationAccountAndSourceCannotBeSame: Belgilangan joyning hisobi va manbasi bir xil bo'lishi mumkin emas.
account.accountGenerateActivationExplain: Hisobni faollashtirish - bu XRP daftaridagi talab. Faollashtirish uchun siz kamida %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} miqdoridagi birinchi depozitni kiritishingiz kerak bo'ladi.
account.accountImportActivationExplain: Siz XRP ledger yangi hisobni import qildingiz. Hisob faollashtirilmagan. Hisobni faollashtirish - bu XRP ledger talab. Faollashtirish uchun siz kamida %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} miqdoridagi birinchi depozitni kiritishingiz kerak bo'ladi.
account.accountActivateReserveExplain: Hisobingizga kiritilgan birinchi %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset}ni sarflash mumkin emas, lekin sizning hisobingizni faol saqlash va kitobdagi to'lovlarni to'lash uchun saqlanadi.
account.accountReserveNotShownExplain: Sizning zaxira qilingan %{nativeAsset}ingiz Xaman-da balans sifatida ko'rinmaydi, lekin siz o'zingizning zaxirangizni %{nativeAsset} balansingiz ustidagi "Mening balansimni tushuntiring" tugmasi bilan ko'rishingiz mumkin.
account.thisAddressAppearsToBeExchangeAddress: Ushbu manzil birja manziliga o'xshaydi, davom etishni xohlaysizmi?
account.unableToHideAllAccountsError: Ushbu hisobni yashirib bo‘lmadi. Hech bo'lmaganda bitta hisob ko'rinishi kerak.
account.unableToHideDefaultAccountError: Unable to hide this default account. Change default account and try again.
account.tapAndHoldToReorder: Kerakli ustuvorlik bo'yicha tartibini o'zgartirish uchun elementni bosib turing
account.toTurnYourSecretIntoXrplLedgerAccountPle: Agar siz XRP Ledger xisobini ochmoqchi bo"lsangiz,iltimos sirli kalitni kiriting.
account.importSecretWithoutChecksumWarning:
Agar davom etsangiz, maxfiy raqamlardan XRP Ledger hisob qaydnomasini import qilasiz. Siz maxfiy raqamlarni yaratishga mas'ul bo'lgan yagona shaxssiz. Ularni yaratish uchun oflayn usuldan foydalanishingizni tavsiya qilamiz (masalan,extimol bilan). Raqamlarni yaratgandan so'ng, ularni saqlashingiz kerak (masalan, metallga muhrlangan, yozib qo'yilgan).
SIZ FAQAT NIMA QILGANINGIZNI BILGANINGIZDA ISH QILISHINGIZ KERAK.
account.tangemCardPasscodeSetWarning: Agar kartangizga parol qo'shilsa, u yo'qolgan (va topilgan) kartada sizning mablag'laringiz xavfsizligini yaxshilaydi, ammo shuni anglash kerakki, sizning mablag'laringiz ISHLAB QOLMAYDI va agar siz buni qilmasangiz (hech kim tomonidan) qaytarib olinmaydi parolingizni eslay olmasangiz.
account.tangemCardAccessCodeSetWarning:
While adding a access code to your card improves the safety of your funds in case of a lost (and found) card, it is important to realize that your funds will be INACCESSIBLE and CAN *NOT* BE RECOVERED (by anyone) if you don't remember your access code.

Are you really sure you want to add a access code to your card?
account.thereAreAccountsEligibleToSign: There are %{signersCount} accounts eligible to sign. Which one do you want to sign with?
account.signatureVerificationExplain: To verify your Tangem cards is working correctly and able to sign transactions, we will perform one signing routine to verify transaction signatures generated by your card.
account.yourXRPLedgerAccountWillNotBeTouched: Your XRP Ledger account & funds will not be touched.
account.checkWhichAccountsNeedBetterEncryption: Check which accounts need better encryption
account.whyUseThisNewEncryptionMethod: Why use this new encryption method?
account.newEncryptionExplain: Our encryption & security is enhanced to new standards AES512 GCM. You should encrypt your account with this new method to be extra safe. Although you are already safe, it can't hurt to upgrade to the new standards.
account.doNotTurnOffYourPhoneOrQuiteWhileMigrati: Don't turn off your phone or quit the app while doing the encryption.
account.unableToFetchAccountNFTokens: Unable to fetch the account NFT's. Please make sure you are connected to the XRP Ledger node.

send.amountIsBiggerThanYourSpend: Bu miqdor siz sarflay oladigan narsadan kattaroqdi (%{spendable})
send.theMaxAmountYouCanSendIs: Siz yuborishingiz mumkin bo'lgan maksimal miqdor %{spendable} %{currency}
send.theMaxAmountYouCanSendWithFee: Emitent transfert uchun %{currency} haq oladi. Maks. Siz yuborishingiz mumkin bo'lgan mablag '(transfer haqini hisobga olgan holda) %{spendable} %{currency}
send.insufficientBalanceSpendableBalance: Balans yetarli emas. Sizning sarflanadigan balansingiz %{spendable} %{currency}
send.trustLineIsFrozenByIssuer: Your Trust Line for the requested asset (%{currency}) has been frozen by the issuer. Please contact the issuer of the asset.
send.balanceIsNotEnoughForFee: Sizning balansingiz to'lovni qoplash uchun etarli emas  (%{fee})
send.sourceAndDestinationCannotBeSame: Manba va Belgilangan manzil bir xil bo'lishi mumkin emas!
send.transferredSuccessfully: Sizning tranzaksiyaingiz %{network} ga muvaffaqiyatli ro'yxatdan o'tkazildi.
send.verificationFailedDescription:
Sizning bitimingiz imzolandi va muvaffaqiyatli topshirildi, ammo biz bitimning yakuniyligini tasdiqlay olmadik.

Bunga internet ulanishining uzilishi yoki siz ulangan XRP Ledger tuguniga yukning ko'payishi sabab bo'lishi mumkin.

Iltimos, ushbu tranzaksiya sizning tranzaktsiyalar tarixida (Voqealar) ko'rsatilishini qo'lda tekshiring.
send.invalidDestinationTag: QR-kodda maqsadli yorliq(tag)mavjud emas. Skanerlangan QR-kodni tekshiring va qaytadan urining
send.destinationIsConfirmedAsScam: Belgilangan hisob qaydnomasi xavf sifatida tasdiqlangan
send.destinationIsProbableIsScam: Belgilangan hisob yuqori xavf sifatida belgilanadi
send.selectedAccountDoNotSupportAsset: Tanlangan hisob qaydnomasi tanlangan aktivni qo'llab-quvvatlamaydi.
send.memoPublicWarning: Memo ma'lumotlari hamma uchun ochiq bo'ladi
send.destinationNotExistTooLittleToCreate: Belgilangan hisob qaydnomasi ilgari ishlatilmagan va balansga ega emas. Hisobni XRP ledger da faollashtirish uchun kamida %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} miqdorida dastlabki depozit talab qilinadi.
send.destinationNotExistCreationWarning: Belgilangan hisob qaydnomasi ilgari ishlatilmagan va balansga ega emas. Agar siz ushbu hisob raqamiga jo'natishni davom ettirsangiz, XRP  ledgerdagi hisobni faollashtirish uchun %{amount} %{nativeAsset} ning %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset}-dan foydalaniladi, ya'ni %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} sarflanmaydi. Haqiqatan ham davom ettirmoqchimisiz?
send.destinationCannotActivateWithIOU: Belgilangan hisob qaydnomasi ilgari ishlatilmagan va balansga ega emas. Hisobni XRP ledgerda faollashtirish uchun hisob raqamiga kamida %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} miqdoridagi dastlabki depozit yuborilishi kerak. %{nativeAsset} bo'lmagan aktivlar dastlabki depozit uchun ishlatilishi mumkin emas.
send.destinationTagIsRequired: Ushbu to'lovni yuborish uchun manzil yorlig'i (tag) talab qilinadi.
send.unableGetRecipientAccountInfoPleaseTryAg: Qabul qiluvchilarni hisobi haqida ma'lumot olinmadi. Iltimos, yana bir bor urinib ko'ring.
send.unableToSetFeesPleaseTryAgain: Unable to set transaction fees, please try again.
send.theDestinationAccountIsSetAsBlackHole: Belgilangan hisob qora tuynuk sifatida o'rnatiladi. Ushbu hisob raqamiga XRP yuborish mablag'larning yo'qolishiga olib keladi.
send.thisAddressRequiredDestinationTag: Ushbu manzil manzil yorlig'i (Tag)ni talab qiladi
send.unableToSendPaymentRecipientDoesNotHaveT:
Tokenni qabul qiluvchiga yuborib bo'lmadi.
Qabul qiluvchida ushbu tokenni emitentga o'rnatish uchun TrustLine mavjud emas.
send.unableToSendPaymentTrustLineLimitIsExcee:
Unable to send the token to the recipient.
The 'Limit' for the amount of tokens the recipient wants to hold is exceeded. The recipient will have to update their TrustLine for the token you're sending with a higher 'Limit' to be able to receive this token.
send.destinationTagWarningConfirm:
Siz manzil yorlig'i bilan qayd yozuvini yubormoqdasiz. Iltimos, manzil yorlig'i(tag)ni yana bir bor tekshirib ko'ring: agar siz noto'g'ri yorliqqa yuborsangiz, mablag'ni olish uchun sizga 
manzil-ning yordami kerak bo'ladi.
send.sendToAccountWithDisallowNativeAssetFlag: Belgilangan hisob qaydnomasi %{nativeAsset} to'lovlarini olishni istamasligini bildiradi. Ushbu manzilga faqat %{nativeAsset} bo'lmagan to'lovlar (%{nativeAsset} Ledgerida chiqarilgan tokenlar) yuborilishi mumkin.
send.unableToSendPaymentNotEnoughLiquidity: Likvidlikning etishmasligi sababli to'lovni hozirda yuborib bo'lmayapti.
send.addressIsUnderInvestigationPleaseCancel: Ushbu manzil tekshirilmoqda. Iltimos, ushbu operatsiyani bekor qiling.
send.toContinueProvideReasonInYourOwnWords: Agar davom ettirishni istasangiz (tavsiya etilmaydi) o'z so'zlaringiz bilan bir sababni keltiring:

asset.selectAnExchangeAndSelectAsset: Emitentni va qo'shmoqchi bo'lgan aktivni tanlang. Ushbu ro'yxat Xaman ishlab chiquvchilari tomonidan saqlanadi.
asset.successRemoved: Aktiv sizning hisobingizdan muvaffaqiyatli olib tashlandi
asset.failedRemove: Aktiv olib tashlanmadi. Xato yuz berdi
asset.trustLineDustRemoveWarning: Ushbu IshonchChizig'i-da hali juda oz miqdordagi %{balance} %{currency} mavjud. Agar davom ettirsangiz, u IshonchChizig'i o'chirilishidan oldin emitentga qaytarib yuboriladi.
asset.dustAmountRemovedYouCanRemoveTrustLineNo: Sizning chang balansingiz emitentga qaytarib yuborildi. IshonchChizigi-ni endi yo'q qilish mumkin.
asset.addingAssetReserveDescription: Adding a token to your account will increase your enforced account reserve by %{ownerReserve} %{nativeAsset}
asset.unableToRemoveAssetNotInDefaultState: Ushbu aktivni sizning hisobingizdan olib tashlash mumkin emas. Yoki emitent ushbu aktivga o'ziga xos sozlamalarni qo'shganligi sababli yoki ularning chiqaruvchi hisobi to'g'ri tuzilmaganligi sababli.
asset.ripplingMisconfigurationWarning: Ushbu ishonch chizig'i uchun amaliyotlar o'chirilmagan, agar bu nima ekanligini bilmasangiz va / yoki bu maqsadga muvofiq emas bo'lsa, iltimos, ushbu parametrni yangilang %{token} belgilarining yo'qolishini oldini olish uchun
asset.lineLimitMisconfigurationWarning: Bu TrustLine nol chegarasi bor (0) tuzilgan, boshqalar ma'no sizga bu ma'lumoti yuborish mumkin emas: siz faqat ma'lumoti ushlab mumkin. Shuningdek, bu belgi olish imkoniyatiga ega bo'lish uchun, Xaman nol (0) TrustLine chegarasi olib tashlash uchun TrustLine yangilash mumkin.
asset.addingTrustLineWarning:
XRPL Labs / Xaman hech qanday token yoki token emitentini tasdiqlamaydi. Siz token emitentiga ishonganingizda davom etishingiz kerak.
Agar token (TrustLine) bilan bog'liq savollar yoki muammolar yuzaga kelsa, siz token emitentiga murojaat qilishingiz kerak bo'ladi.
asset.trustLineIsAlreadyExist: This token already exists. You cannot add the same token again.
asset.issuerAddressCopiedToClipboard: Issuer address copied to the clipboard
asset.unableToLoadListOfTokens: Unable to load the list of tokens!
asset.copyIssuerAddressWarning:
%{issuerAddress}

You are about to copy the Issuer Address. The Issuer Address for an asset should only be used to verify the legitimacy of the asset. While you can copy the issuer address, please note that sending assets to the issuer address will PERMANENTLY BURN THE TOKENS.

exchange.failedExchange: Likvidlik yo'qligi yoki valyuta kurslarining yangilanganligi sababli ayirboshlash mumkin emas.
exchange.liquidityIsNotEnough: Likvidlik yetarli emas, aynan hozir ayirboshlash mumkin emas!
exchange.liquidityIsNotSoMuch: Likvidlik nisbatan past. Siz hali ham davom etishingiz mumkin, ammo butun almashinuvingiz uchun eng yaxshi narxni olmaysiz!
exchange.theMaxAmountYouCanExchangeIs: Siz almashtirishingiz mumkin bo'lgan maksimal miqdor %{spendable} %{currency}
exchange.exchangeByThirdPartyMessage: Agar siz talab qilingan narx darajasida bajarish uchun taklif yaratmoqchi bo'lsangiz, chegara tartibini yaratish uchun siz uchinchi tomon Xaman yoqilgan XRP Toolkit dasturidan foydalanishingiz mumkin.
exchange.requestedLiquidityNotAvailable: Miqdorni almashtirish mumkin emas: Markazlashtirilmagan birjada etarli takliflar mavjud emas.
exchange.reverseLiquidityNotAvailable: Miqdorni almashtirish mumkin emas: Markazlashtirilmagan birjada takliflar etishmasligi asosida siz uni qaytarib berolmaysiz.
exchange.maxSpreadExceeded: Sotish va sotib olish takliflari o'rtasidagi narx farqi (tarqalishi) juda yuqori.
exchange.maxSlippageExceeded: Ayriboshlash kursi yomon bo'ladi, chunki Markazlashtirilmagan birjada takliflar etarli emas (yaxshi).
exchange.maxReverseSlippageExceeded: Agar siz qayta almashtirishga harakat qilsangiz, ayriboshlash kursi yomon bo'ladi, chunki Markazlashmagan Birjada takliflar etarli emas (yaxshi).
exchange.slippageSpreadWarning:
The exchange rate displayed is an estimate based on the current offers available on the XRP Ledger Decentralized Exchange.
When you execute this trade and the liquidity changes while executing your transaction, you may get an up to %{slippage}% worse exchange rate. Please continue only if you accept this.

scan.theQRIsNotWhatWeExpect: Ushbu QR kodda biz kutgan ma'lumotlar mavjud emas!
scan.theClipboardDataIsNotWhatWeExpect: Bufer ma'lumotlari biz kutgan narsa emas!

payload.payloadHandledByAnotherClient: Boshqa mijoz tomonidan boshqariladigan tulov yuki
payload.payloadAlreadyResolved: Ushbu tulov yuki allaqachon imzolangan yoki rad etilgan. Iltimos, so'rovni yaratgan jarayonni takrorlang va yangi so'rovni skanerlang
payload.payloadExpired: Ushbu tulov yuki muddati tugagan. Iltimos, so'rovni yaratgan jarayonni takrorlang va yangi so'rovni skanerlang.
payload.invalidOrMissingSignedTransactionBlob: Noto'g'ri yoki etishmayotgan imzolangan bitim bloki
payload.unexpectedPayloadErrorOccurred: Tulov yuki yaroqsiz va avtomatik ravishda rad etiladi.
payload.notEnoughLiquidityToSendThisPayment: Ushbu to'lovni yuborish uchun likvidlik etarli emas.
payload.unableToCheckAssetConversion: Aktiv konvertatsiyasini tekshirib bo'lmadi. Iltimos, XRPL tarmogiga ulanganingizga ishonch hosil qiling
payload.unableToGetNetworkFee: Tarmoq to'lovini ololmadi. Iltimos, XRPL tuguniga ulanganingizga ishonch hosil qiling.
payload.checkCanOnlyCashByCheckDestination: Tekshiruvni faqat Xaman-da O'qish / Yozish (yoki oddiy kalit) rejimida mavjud bo'lgan joyda tekshirish mumkin.
payload.unableToGetCheckObject: Tekshirish ob'ekti olinmadi. Iltimos, XRPL tuguniga ulanganingizga ishonch hosil qiling
payload.checkObjectDoesNotExist: Ob'ektni olish imkonsiz. Iltimos, XRP Ledgerida chek mavjudligiga ishonch hosil qiling
payload.nonExpiredCheckCanOnlyCancelByCreatedAcc: Chekni (muddati tugamagan) faqat uni yaratgan yoki maqsadli hisob qaydnomasi bekor qilishi mumkin.
payload.accountDeleteExchangeSupportWarning: Eslatma: XRP ledgeringizni o'chirishda va qolgan qoldiqni birjaga yuborishda, maqsadli almashinuv AccountDelete operatsiyalari yordamida depozitlarni qo'llab-quvvatlashiga ishonch hosil qiling. Hamma almashinuvlar amalga oshirilmaydi, natijada sizning mablag'laringizni hisobingizga olish uchun birjani qo'llab-quvvatlash jarayoni amalga oshiriladi
payload.notVettedTokenTradeWarning:
O'z xavfi savdo! Agar savdo haqida belgi * * vetted qilinmagan**.

Har bir inson, shu jumladan, loyihalarni taqdim etishni talab qiladigan mavjud belgilarning soxta versiyalarini yaratishi mumkin. Agar siz ushbu tovarni sotsangiz, uni qaytarib sotolmaysiz. Potentsial xavfi sizning aktivlar/omonat qo'yib bor!
payload.tradeEntireTokenWorthWarning: Warning: the amount of %{currency} is equal to or higher than your %{currency} balance of this asset. If this offer is executed, you will fully liquidate your %{currency} position.
payload.paymentToDisallowedNativeAssetWarning: The destination account configured their account to disallow incoming %{nativeAsset} (non-token) payments. If you proceed, you will most likely need support from the destination account owner.
payload.paymentToBlackHoledAccountWarning: The destination account is 'black holed', meaning all funds sent to the destination account will be inaccessible & unrecoverable. Are you sure you want to continue sending your funds to this destination account?
payload.unableToFindTheOfferObject: Unable to find the offer object!
payload.theIssuerCanBurnThisToken: Note: The issuer can burn this token.
payload.payloadForceNetworkError: This payload is not available on the network you are connected with
payload.pleaseSwitchToNetworkAndTryAgain: Please switch to %{network} and try again
payload.didDeleteWarning: Warning: You are about to delete the Decentralized Identifier (DID) tied to the selected account. Keep in mind, this action cannot be undone.

monetization.comingPaymentWarning: Thank you for using Xaman! You are still using Xaman for free, but you may be prompted for a small in-app payment to allow us to keep building to secure your assets.
monetization.paymentRequired: You have reached the free usage threshold. While you can still send payments for free, there is a small fee required to continue using xApps and for receiving Sign Requests. If you choose not to extend your usage limits, they will reset on the first of every month, at which time Xaman will be free to use again.
monetization.prePurchaseMessage: Thank you for your support. We really appreciate it! Your payment has now unlocked a full month of unrestricted Xaman use, and helps us to continue developing Xaman, provide support & keep your funds safe. 🤗
monetization.monetizationRequiredForThisFeature: You currently can’t open Sign Requests & xApps: a small payment is required to unlock a full month of unrestricted use of Xaman. Developing Xaman, building secure software takes a lot of resources. We hope you will support us continuing to build. If you decide not to: every month your limits will reset, allowing you to open xApps & Sign Requests again.

errors.unableToLoadTermOfService: Oops! Unable to Retrieve Terms of Service
errors.unableToLoadChangeLogs: Oops! Unable to Retrieve Change Logs
errors.tecPATH_DRY:
The transaction didn't work because funds couldn't be moved between the two accounts, or could not be moved at the requested exchange rate.

This might be because the two accounts involved don't have a connection (TrustLine) that allows them to exchange money with each other, or the transaction didn't work because there wasn't enough money available to move between the two accounts.
errors.tecPATH_PARTIAL: The transaction didn't go through because there weren't enough tokens available to send the complete amount at the requested exchange rate between the two accounts.
errors.tecHOOK_REJECTED:
Rejected by hook on sending or receiving account.

%{hookReturnString}
